```
apiVersion: batch/v1 
kind: Job 
metadata: 
  name: {{ .Release.Name }}-hook
  annotations: 
    "helm.sh/hook": post-install 
spec: 
  template: 
    metadata: 
      name: {{ .Release.Name }}-hook
    spec: 
      restartPolicy: Never 
      containers: 
      - name: {{ .Release.Name }}-hook
        command: ["/bin/sh", "-c"]
        args:
          - echo "Hook executed at $(date)"
        image: alpine
```
